title: Basic html file input test
description: A basic html file input test.

chrome.output: "upload an image, button, to activate press enter"
in list of form controls as "upload an image button"
announced the file input control without the current value

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

edge.output: "upload an image, button, to activate press enter"
in list of form controls as "upload an image button"
announced the file input control without the current value

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

ie.output: "upload an image, file upload, edit, browse..."
"upload an image, button, to activate press space bar"
in list of form fields as "browse ... button"
announced the file input control with the current value

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file
the value is a separate item from the button in reading mode

firefox.output: "upload an image, file upload, edit, browse..."
in list of form controls as "upload an image browse... button"
announced the title of the window

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

edge.output: "upload an image, enter name of file to upload, edit read only"

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

chrome.output: "upload an image, button, upload an image"
in list of form fields as "upload an image; button"

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

edge.output: "upload an image, button, upload an image"
in list of form fields as "upload an image; button"

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

firefox.output: "clickable, upload an image, button, browse, no file selected"
in list of form fields as "browse... button"

results.notes: the selected a file from the prompt and activated the button to open the file

and_chr.output: input was announced without the value

results.notes: took a picture and used that for the file

and_chr.output: input was flagged with a number

ios_saf.output: "upload an image, no file selected, button"
"upload an image, no file selected, button"
focus was lost and sent to the formatting options button at the top of safari, no indication of value was conveyed

results.notes: took a picture and used that for the file

safari.output: "no file selected, upload an image, file upload button"
"no file selected, upload an image, file upload button"
"no file selected, upload an image, file upload button"
in list of form controls as "no file selected Upload an image file upload button"
input was focused with new value conveyed

firefox.output: "upload an image, clickable, push button, no file selected"
in list of form controls as "upload an image; push button; browse..."
the input was announced without the value

safari.output: input was flagged with a number

chrome.output: role was flagged with a number

edge.output: role was flagged with a number
